text: right Radio Zindagi (Hindi: जिंदगी, pronounced "Jindagī", meaning "life") is a franchised radio format that is currently broadcasting in California, New York, and the Washington DC metro area. It is currently the largest South Asian radio format in North America and had its beginnings with KZDG in California starting in 2011. The current affiliates now include: * KITS-HD3 105.3 FM in San Francisco, California * WHUD-HD2 100.7 FM in Peekskill, New York * WSPK-HD2 104.7 FM in Poughkeepsie, New York * WWRL AM 1600 in New York City * WSSR-HD2 96.7 FM in the Chicago area ==References== Category:Franchised radio formats Category:Hindi-language mass media in the United States Category:South Asian American culture
title: Radio Zindagi
